document_name: Project Document of Entrepreneurship Development Programme

outputs.output_descr:
The overall objective of the programme is to bring about a transformational change in unleashing the growth potential of micro- and small-scale enterprises by 2015 through entrepreneurial skills training and provision of a comprehensive range of business advisory services. The project is to be established under the framework of the UNDP initiative and will identify and select growth-oriented enterprises as well as potential entrepreneurs, unemployed youth and women entrepreneurs and provide them with entrepreneurship training and a comprehensive and integrated range of business development services in Addis Ababa and all the 11 regions of Ethiopia.

Intended outputs are:-

1) Set Up Enterprise Centre
 2) Provide Entrepreneurship Training(Incl. Trainer of Trainers for ETW and BDS)
 3) Delivery of business advisory services
3) Create Awareness and Policy Dialogue
